title: Kraftwerk's Iconic Electronic Song Pocket Calculator Remastered
summary: Kraftwerk's 1981 electronic music track featuring synthesizers and calculator sounds
content:
• Released as 2009 remastered version
• Song length is 4:57
• Features lyrics about operating a pocket calculator
• Combines electronic music with mathematical themes
• Known for minimalist electronic composition style
• Performed by German electronic music pioneers Kraftwerk
